annotation.text: When the incubations were carried out with both ions at varying concentrations using WT p94 partially purified from rat GC (supplemental Fig. S2), the ion effects were additive; that is, the [Na+] required for half-maximal autolytic activity was 15 mm at [Ca2+] = 100 nm, indicating that physiological cytosolic concentrations of Na+ and Ca2+ can activate WT p94 (Fig. 2, B and C).
